title: Islambad Capital Territory Local Government Elections Ordinance, 2002
title_en: Islambad Capital Territory Local Government Elections Ordinance, 2002
description: Official consolidated text of Islambad Capital Territory Local Government Elections Ordinance, 2002 (LVII of 2002) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Ordinance may be called the
Islamabad Capital Territory Local Government Elections (Amendment) Ordinance, 2002.
(2) It shall come into force at once and shall be deemed to have taken effect on the 2nd October,

provisions.title: Section 2002. 2. Amendment of section 15, Ordinance LVII of 2002.­­­In the Islamabad Capital Territory
provisions.content:
Local Government Elections Ordinance, 2002 (LVII of 2002), hereinafter referred to as the said
Ordinance; in section 15, for clause (e) the following shall be substituted, namely:
"(e) is at least a graduate possessing a bachelor degree in any discipline or any degree
recognized as equivalent under any law for the time being in force, for contesting election
of a Nazim or Naib Nazim;"

provisions.title: Section 3. Amendment of section 18, Ordinance LVII of 2002.­­­In the said Ordinance, in section 18, in
provisions.content:
subsection (1), in the first proviso, for the figure "2004" the figure "2005" shall be substituted.
_____
